title: Sparkling Honey
summaries: The Sparkling Honey is a pet-summoning item that spawns a Honey Bee pet, a large bee which follows the player around. The Sparkling Honey has a 1/4 (25%) chance of being dropped by the Queen Bee in Master Mode.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a honey bee
'The secret ingredient for royal bees.'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
